General.Name: Wuhan Kotei Informatics Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Wuhan Kotei Informatics Co.,Ltd. provides integrated software solutions for intelligent networked vehicles in China. It offers software service outsourcing; and research and development of software products and solutions, and intelligent terminal software systems. The company also engages in research and development of mobile Internet and communication technology; and provision of application satellite navigation and positioning, and production of electronic map, as well as geographic information system and engineering application. In addition, it offers surveying and mapping of spatial geographic data, such as cadastral survey, geographic national conditions, engineering survey, etc.; map database construction service; and processing of data and content information services. Further, the company provides computer software and hardware; research and development of intelligent terminal equipment; wholesale and retail of technical services; and import and export of goods, technology, and agency. It also engages in the lease of non-residential real estate and automobile; and property management services. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Wuhan, China.
